About the Company: Ashish Polyplast Ltd is engaged in the manufacture of hose and hose assemblies They are one of the distinguished manufacturers and exporters of a wide range of Premium Braided Hoses, and Flexible PVC Hoses. Their product range include Premium Braided Hoses i.e.Realon Water Hose, Realon Car Washing Hose,Realon Welding Hose - Red & Blue,Realon Rock Drilling Hose - Transparent,Realon Air & Pneumatic Hose - Transparent; and Flexible PVC Hose i.e.Ashish Realflex Duct Hose - Grey,Ashish Realflex Medium Duty PVC Hose,Ashish Realflex Oil Hose -Blue,Ashish Realflex Non-Toxic Hose - Transparent, & Ashish Realflex Heavy Duty Hose -Grey
